name: Winter Cladding
query:
select c.name 'File Number:Link/Client:150',
c.full_name as 'Full Name:Read Only:200',
max(wct.date_of_receive) as 'Receive Date:Read Only:150',
TIMESTAMPDIFF(Year,max(wct.date_of_receive), Now()) as 'Time Spent:Read Only:150', 
max(wct.date_of_receiving_heaters) as 'Heaters Date:Read Only:150',
TIMESTAMPDIFF(Year,max(wct.date_of_receiving_heaters), Now()) as 'Heaters Time:Read Only:150'
from tabClient c,`tabWinter Cladding Table` as wct 
where c.name = wct.parent
group by  c.name
